quest.name: Chimerical Maintenance
journal: The guidance node is ready to take you through the Beta Quadrant.

At your word, the guidance node hovers off, but not before warning you that the Beta Quadrant is home to chimerical monstrosities. Follow the node to Matter Conduit IV-V and speak with it to receive further instructions.

You arrive at the next matter conduit only to find that it does not work. According to the guidance node, chimerical creatures nearby are siphoning away the energy necessary for activation. Alphinaud suggests that you split up and eliminate these pests. For your part, see to the creatures at the Recombination Labs.
You have eliminated your share of the chimerical creatures. Make your way back to the guidance node at Matter Conduit IV-V.
With no monsters left to siphon energy, the matter conduit comes back to life and is now able to send you to the Gamma Quadrant. Examine the conduit when you are ready to proceed.
You arrive in the Gamma Quadrant to find the place crawling with Garlean soldiers. Their presence is an unwelcome complication to your mission.
objectives: Speak with the guidance node at Matter Conduit IV-V.
Lie in wait at the Recombination Labs and defeat chimerical creatures.
Speak with the guidance node at Matter Conduit IV-V.
Use the Allagan teleporter to travel to the Gamma Quadrant.

dialogue.name: GUIDANCESYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> Resuming guidance to the Aetherochemical Research Facility. Please follow me.

dialogue.name: GUIDANCESYSTEM
dialogue.text: This sector, the Beta Quadrant, is home to laboratories which produce chimerical life-forms for both military and household applications.

dialogue.name: GUIDANCESYSTEM
dialogue.text: Our facility has been awarded three-star certification for compliance with ASO–3001. The good behavior of the creatures born here is guaranteed.

dialogue.name: GUIDANCESYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please be warned, however, that millennia of neglect may have had an adverse effect on their disposition. For your own safety, please refrain from approaching the creatures.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Are you certain it is wise to trust our lives to this orb?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: That node is not what it seems. From amidst the metal, I sense the gaze of a living being. Have care around it.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The matter conduit appears to operate on the same principle as aetherytes. It certainly has stood the test of time.

dialogue.name: GUIDANCESYSTEM
dialogue.text:
<blip> Unable to activate matter conduit. Energy shortage detected.
Identifying cause...

dialogue.name: GUIDANCESYSTEM
dialogue.text:
Cause identified: unauthorized siphoning of energy by chimerical creatures.
Locations: the Recombination Labs and the Biomass Incubation Complex.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Time is short─let us split up and eliminate the culprits. Forename, pray dispatch the creatures at the Recombination Labs.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The rest of us shall sweep the Incubation Complex. Take care, and return hither when you are done.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: The orb is beginning to try my patience.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: The Allagans did not respect life. Brilliant as they were, I cannot bring myself to respect them.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The area teems with chimerical creatures. Be on your guard.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: I welcome the chance to limber up ahead of the battle to come.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: What has gotten into Alphinaud all of a sudden?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I can hold my own!

dialogue.name: GUIDANCESYSTEM
dialogue.text:
Energy shortage detected.
Cause: unauthorized siphoning of energy by chimerical creatures.
Locations: the Recombination Labs and the Biomass Incubation Complex.

dialogue.name: GUIDANCESYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> Energy restored to the conduit. Please wait a moment while I activate it.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Machines are not to be trusted, least of all those that can think.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Alphinaud has come far. Master Louisoix would be proud.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: While facing the chimerical creatures, I had a moment of inspiration. I feel I have attained a better affinity with arcane entities.

dialogue.name: GUIDANCESYSTEM
dialogue.text: Conduit activated. You may travel to the Gamma Quadrant at your leisure.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: While facing the chimerical creatures, I had a moment of inspiration. I feel I have attained a better affinity with arcane entities.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Machines are not to be trusted, least of all those that can think.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: The next quadrant awaits. Let us make haste.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: So the Garleans managed to land... Repairs on their vessel appear to be well underway.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I doubt that they will leave any time soon, however. Nay, they will remain here long after they have stripped the isle of all its secrets.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Whether or not they mean to linger, their presence here and now is an unwelcome complication.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Indeed. Let us avoid confrontations unless absolutely needful.

obj.n: Close Encounters of the VIth Kind
